option.fogoverrides.general.creative-ove: How the game should behave when in creative mode or spectator mode.
OVERRIDE: Use the custom fog overrides.
option.fogoverrides.special.potion-affec: If enabled: Fire resistance is required to extend lava fog & Water breathing is required to extend water fog.
option.fogoverrides.general.adjust-dista: Toggle the fog distance override module.
option.fogoverrides.general.adjust-color: Toggle the fog color override module.
option.fogoverrides.special.fire-overlay: If the animated fire texture should be on screen when burning.
Reposition the fire overlay up and down. Negative being lower on screen and positive being higher up.
option.fogoverrides.special.water-overla: If the overlay texture should be rendered when under water.
option.fogoverrides.special.frostbite-ov: If the overlay texture should be enabled when affected by frostbite.
option.fogoverrides.general.cloud-height: Set the y-coordinate of the clouds.
option.fogoverrides.general.cloud-color-: Adjusts cloud color according to fog color.
Sets how much the color will blend with the default cloud color.
Allowing some blending lets the cloud color adjust to weather and time conditions.
option.fogoverrides.void.y-level-activat: The Y coordinate in which the void fog is allowed to exist under.
option.fogoverrides.void.enable-void-par: If the old void particles should be enabled with the void fog.
option.fogoverrides.void.affected-by-sky: If when you are in sky light level 8 or above the void fog should turn off.
option.fogoverrides.fog-enabled.tooltip: If the fog should be enabled.
option.fogoverrides.fog-override.tooltip: If the fog should be overridden in the selected biome.
option.fogoverrides.fog-start-distance.t: The distance from the player where the fog should start fading in.
option.fogoverrides.fog-end-distance.too: The distance from the player where the fog should reach to.
option.fogoverrides.fog-distance.error: Start distance can't be more or the same as the End distance.
option.fogoverrides.override-fog-color.t: Overrides the fog in the selected area to the color set below.
option.fogoverrides.fog-color.tooltip: The color of the fog in the selected area.
option.fogoverrides.fog-color-blend.tool: Ratio on how much the override fog color should blend with the local fog color.
